message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $10000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $16500 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer for now.
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need at least $16000 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer for now.
I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to keep negotiating. I'll meet you at $14500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is my last offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
